entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:28 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 7:02 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -45.6°C
Wind: WSW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 43 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill minus 60 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:07 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:07 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
